moves.1. e4: Normal opening. I find it more practical than d4 as e4 opens queen and ls bishop, as d4 only ds bishop.
moves.1... e5: Boris was never interested in the Sicilian or Caro-Kann.
moves.2. Qh5: Some people play it, some dont. Yeah, dont get your queen out to early in the game, but I just wanted to see how it went.
moves.2... Nc6:
Protecting Qxe5+.
And developing a piece.
moves.3. Bc4: Duh. If he would fall for Scholar's mate, then I dont know what.
moves.4... f5: ??. Blunder. Better was Qf6 or Nf6.
